mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT u.id AS partusedid, u.registedspecnum, u.receivednum, u.applicant, u.jobnumber, u.concatinfo, u.applicattime, u.receivestatus, o.id AS ordersid, o.numbering AS ordernumbering, o.customerid, o.vehicleid, p.id AS partid, p.partnumbering, p.partname, p.purchaseprice, c.id AS categoryid, c.partcategory, s.id AS supplierid, s.supplierName, w.id AS warehouseid, w.warehouseName, w.warehouseAdd, ps.id AS partstorageid, ps.detaillocation, ps.inventory FROM partused AS u JOIN orders AS o ON (u.ordersid = o.id) JOIN part AS p ON (u.partid = p.id) JOIN partcategory AS c ON (p.partcategoryid = c.id) JOIN supplier AS s ON (s.id = p.supplierid) JOIN partstorage AS ps ON (ps.partid = p.id) JOIN warehouse AS w ON (w.id = ps.warehouseid)
u.applicattime BETWEEN concat(#{startTime},' 00:00:00') and concat(#{endTime},' 23:59:59')
and (u.applicant like concat('%',#{keyworld},'%') or u.jobnumber like concat('%',#{keyworld},'%'))
and u.receivednum=u.registedspecnum
and u.receivednum<u.registedspecnum
order by u.applicattime desc
